CodeEditingAgent_implementDetailedDesign.name: CodeEditingAgent_implementDetailedDesignPlan
CodeEditingAgent_implementDetailedDesign.description:
Edits the files to implement the plan and commits changes to version control
It also compiles, formats, lints, and runs tests where applicable.

parameters.name: implementationPlan
parameters.description: The detailed implementation plan to make the changes for. Include any git branch and commit naming conventions to follow

parameters.name: fileSelection
parameters.description: {string[]} An array of files which the code editing agent will have access to.
